hooks.command: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path *.sln) { Write-Output 'C# solution detected - pragmatic-dev-team active' }"

hooks.prompt: If user mentions 'commit', 'PR', 'done', 'finished', 'ready', 'merge', or 'push': append brief reminder 'verification-before-completion: run build+tests first'. Otherwise output nothing.

Check command for dangerous patterns: rm -rf, del /s /q, format, DROP TABLE, TRUNCATE, force push, --force. If dangerous: return 'deny: Dangerous operation blocked'. If contains 'git commit' and build wasn't verified: return 'deny: Run msbuild and dotnet test before committing'. Otherwise: 'allow'.
Check if file path contains .env, secrets, credentials, connection strings, or API keys. If sensitive file: 'deny: Cannot modify sensitive files'. Otherwise: 'allow'.
If C# file (.cs) modified: output 'C# modified. Run /review when ready.' If .feature file modified: output 'Feature modified. Run scenarios before claiming done.' Otherwise output nothing.
Agent task completed. Reminder: Verify agent claims independently via VCS diff or tests.

Before stopping, check: 1) Were C# files modified this session? 2) Was build (msbuild) run after last .cs change? 3) Were tests (dotnet test) run? If C# modified without build+test verification: 'block: Run msbuild -v:m && dotnet test before stopping'. Otherwise: 'approve'.
